task: Develop a basic 'Parcheesi' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Use fewer notes'.
name: Streamlined Parcheesi

branding_data.short_description: A minimalist take on the classic Parcheesi board game.
branding_data.detailed_description: Streamlined Parcheesi is a modern reinterpretation of the traditional Parcheesi board game, inspired by the oblique strategy 'Use fewer notes.' This version strips down the complexity to deliver a minimalist experience while maintaining the core mechanics. Players race their pieces around a simplified board, aiming to be the first to get all their tokens to the home area. The game focuses on strategic movement and decision-making with fewer components and rules, offering a fresh and accessible take on a beloved classic.
